title: Ni√ßoise Salad
description: A famous French salad with crispy lettuce, peppers, olives, and our Chicago-style feta cheese, garnished with crunchy garlic and rosemary croutons.

title: Tuna Salad
description: A fresh and flavorful salad with tuna, fresh vegetables, and a savory dressing, perfect for a light yet filling meal.

title: Spicy Beef Ribs
description: A classic recipe from grandma's cookbook, with perfectly seasoned beef ribs cooked to perfection. Tender and full of flavor.

title: Vegetable Fried Rice
description: A delicious and aromatic dish made with stir-fried rice, mixed vegetables, and a savory seasoning. A perfect side or light meal.

title: Berry Tiramisu
description: A sweet and indulgent dessert with layers of berries and the classic creamy tiramisu filling. A twist on the traditional favorite.

title: Orange-Coffee Cheesecake
description: A unique cheesecake with a rich orange and coffee flavor, offering a refreshing and indulgent twist on the classic dessert.

title: Grilled Fish with Vegetables
description: Grilled fish served with a mix of perfectly cooked vegetables. A healthy and flavorful option for seafood lovers.

title: Tuna Sushi
description: Fresh tuna served as sushi with perfectly seasoned rice and a touch of wasabi, bringing an authentic taste of Japan to your table.
